ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Re: Welcome to shadowknight
ygData.msgSnippet: No, sorry. I personally haven t unsubscribed in case EQ2 brings the list back to life. :) ... http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
ygData.messageBody:
No, sorry. I personally haven't unsubscribed in case EQ2 brings the list
back to life. :)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael Schaefer [mailto:mbs@...]
> Sent: Saturday, June 21, 2003 9:54 AM
> To: shadowknight@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Re: Welcome to shadowknight
>
> Two years?
>
> lol
>
> This IS a dead list
>
> Know any better ones?
>
>
>
> Jeremy Pollack wrote:
>
> >Hello Baneluk. Sorry to say this list is pretty much dead. An email
> >about once every six months, and if we're lucky it isn't spam. :)
> >
> >Enjoy the Shadowknight. I haven't played in two years, but the
> >Shadowknight's were always one of the most fun RP classes out there,
> >imo.
> >
> >
>
